import {css} from "emotion";
import {isNumber} from "lodash";
 
import {unitMath,applyUnitIfRequired} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import flaggedStyles from "../../../utils/flagged-styles";
// import {unitMath} from "../../utils/css-utils";
import getMenuVars from "../menu/menu.var";
 
const thumbSizes = {
  mini: 1,
  tiny: 1.5,
  small: 2,
  medium: 2.5,
  large: 3,
  big: 4,
  huge: 5,
};
 
export default styleMemoize(function(flags = [], sizeName = "medium") {
 
  const menuVars = getMenuVars();
 
  const {
    textLineHeight,
    boxShadow,
    border,
  } = menuVars;
 
  const thumbBaseSize = applyUnitIfRequired(textLineHeight,"em"); 
 
  const size = isNumber(sizeName)
    ? `${sizeName}px`
    : unitMath(thumbBaseSize,"*",(thumbSizes[sizeName] || thumbSizes.medium),"em");
 
  return flaggedStyles(`${isNumber(sizeName) ? "sized" : sizeName}-listview-thumb`,flags,{
 
    _: ()=>(css`
      &, body & {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
        align-self: start;
        &>* {
          display:block;
          background-position:center;
          background-repeat:no-repeat;
          background-size:cover;
          width: ${size};
          height:${size};
        }
 
      }
    `),
    withIcon: ()=>(css`
      &, body & {
        & > i {
          font-size:${size};
          width:1em;
          line-height:1em;
          height:1em;
          vertical-align:top;
          margin:0;
          >svg {
            display:block;
            padding: 15%;
          }
        }
      }
 
    `),
 
    bordered: ()=>(css`
      &, body & {
        & > * {
          box-shadow:${boxShadow};
          border: ${border};
        }
      }
    `),
 
    rounded: ()=>(css`
      &, body & {
        & > * {
          border-radius:10%;
        }
      }
    `),
 
    contained: ()=>(css`
      &, body & {
        & > * {
          background-size:contain;
        }
      }
    `),
 
  });
 
});
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 04 2019 18:54:39 GMT+0000 (GMT)
